name: Karpillia
desc: The owner of Sailing Breeze. She was originally from Mondstadt but was unable to compete with Angel's Share.

customize.name: Dandelion Seed
customize.desc: A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Rainbow Aster
customize.desc: A unique drink. Having featured in the famous light novel "Pretty Please, Kitsune Guuji?", it has since been brought to life by Sailing Breeze in collaboration with Yae Publishing House, along with its fascinating flavor. As this version does not contain any bean products, it is slightly different from the special limited edition that was available during the Irodori Festival, but this also means that there's no risk of triggering any bean allergies.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Ah yes, yes. That's how the story started. While in the employ of a merchant ship traveling between Mondstadt and Inazuma, you encountered monsters on a floating island...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Use Elemental DMG to trigger Elemental Reactions and destroy the Abyss Mage's shield!</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>
